summary: The code specifies a custom clip text encoder using CLIPTextEncoder with the associated configuration file located in "vced/code/service/customClipText/config.yml". It defines one Python module, "clip_text.py", which is used for processing the clipboard text.

details.comment: The code specifies a custom clip text encoder using CLIPTextEncoder with the associated configuration file located in "vced/code/service/customClipText/config.yml". It defines one Python module, "clip_text.py", which is used for processing the clipboard text.
